document.discussion_title: Shell Eggs: Daily National Egg Market-at-a-Glance
document.topic_text: AJ_PY027 Atlanta, GA Fri. Aug 12, 2016 USDA Market News SHELL EGGS: Daily National Egg Market-at-a-Glance Egg prices in New York are 2 cents higher for Medium, unchanged on the large sizes. California and regional prices are steady. Asking prices for next week's deliveries are trending higher on larger sizes, while steady to instance higher on Medium. The undertone is steady to higher. Retail and food service demand is reported as moderate to fairly good. Offerings are light to moderate. Current supplies are light to moderate in California and the Northeast region, moderate elsewhere. Market activity is moderate, however moderate to active in California. Breaking stock floor stocks are moderate to fully adequate; breaking schedules are mixed, usually full-time. Light type fowl supplies are at least moderate for the light demand. SOURCE: USDA Livestock, Poultry & Grain Market News Division Atlanta, GA 404.562.5850 email: Atlanta.lpgmn@ams.usda.gov http://www.ams.usda.gov/market-news/livestock-poultry-grain Prepared: 12-Aug-16 01:10 PM MTH
